law.catch_line: Within 90 days after the end of each fiscal year or as soon as practicable after that, the Secretary...
law.text: Within 90 days after the end of each fiscal year or as soon as practicable after that, the Secretary shall file a complete report with the Governor showing the status, as of the end of that fiscal year, of the State highway construction program. The report shall be in the form that the Governor requires and be open to public inspection.
